description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。曾任中共广东省委常委、广州市委书记，现任广东省政协主席、党组书记。中共第二十届中央候补委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China. He previously served as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Guangdong Provincial Committee and Secretary of the CPC Guangzhou Municipal Committee. He is currently the Chairman and Party Group Secretary of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC). He is also an alternate member of the 20th Central Committee of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议广东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议广东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在广东省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的前任广东省政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's predecessor as Chairman of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Guangzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任广州市副书记兼市长，后接替林克庆担任广州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Deputy Secretary and Mayor of Guangzhou, and later succeeded Lin Keqing as Secretary of the CPC Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的前任广州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在林克庆担任广东省常务副省长期间任广东省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Governor of Guangdong while Lin Keqing was the Executive Vice Governor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的前任广东省常务副省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's predecessor as Executive Vice Governor of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的后任广东省常务副省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's successor as Executive Vice Governor of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Beijing Municipality, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在林克庆担任北京市常务副市长期间任北京市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Mayor of Beijing while Lin Keqing was the Executive Vice Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的前任北京市常务副市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's predecessor as Executive Vice Mayor of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的后任北京市常务副市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's successor as Executive Vice Mayor of Beijing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会教育工作委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会教育工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会的派出机构，负责领导北京市的教育工作。
description.en: An agency dispatched by the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee, responsible for leading education work in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在林克庆担任北京市委教育工委书记期间任北京市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee while Lin Keqing was Secretary of the Education Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在林克庆担任北京市委教育工委书记期间接替郭金龙任北京市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, succeeded Guo Jinlong as Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee while Lin Keqing was Secretary of the Education Work Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的前任北京市委教育工委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Kqing's predecessor as Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的后任北京市委教育工委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's successor as Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A prestigious comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖北省省直辖县级市，林克庆的出生地。
description.en: A sub-prefecture-level city directly administered by Hubei Province, China. It is the birthplace of Lin Keqing.

description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市大兴区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市大兴区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的前任中共北京市大兴区委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Beijing Daxing District Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的后任中共北京市大兴区委书记及北京市大兴区人民政府区长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's successor as Secretary of the CPC Beijing Daxing District Committee and as Mayor of the Daxing District People's Government.

nodes.id: 北京市大兴区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，林克庆的前任北京市大兴区人民政府区长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Lin Keqing's predecessor as Mayor of the Daxing District People's Government in Beijing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议广东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 林克庆接替王荣 (1958年)担任中国人民政治协商会议广东省委员会主席。
description.en: Lin Keqing succeeded Wang Rong (born 1958) as Chairman of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 在林克庆担任广州市委书记期间，郭永航任副书记兼市长。
description.en: While Lin Keqing served as Secretary of the CPC Guangzhou Municipal Committee, Guo Yonghang was the Deputy Secretary and Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 林克庆接替张硕辅担任中国共产党广州市委员会书记。
description.en: Lin Keqing succeeded Zhang Shuofu as Secretary of the CPC Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 郭永航接替林克庆担任中国共产党广州市委员会书记。
description.en: Guo Yonghang succeeded Lin Keqing as Secretary of the CPC Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 林克庆担任广东省常务副省长期间，省长为马兴瑞。
description.en: While Lin Keqing served as Executive Vice Governor of Guangdong, the governor was Ma Xingrui.

description.zh-cn: 林克庆接替林少春担任广东省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Lin Keqing succeeded Lin Shaochun as Executive Vice Governor of Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 张虎接替林克庆担任广东省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Zhang Hu succeeded Lin Keqing as Executive Vice Governor of Guangdong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 林克庆担任北京市常务副市长期间，市长为陈吉宁。
description.en: While Lin Keqing served as Executive Vice Mayor of Beijing, the mayor was Chen Jining.

description.zh-cn: 林克庆接替张工 (1961年)担任北京市人民政府常务副市长。
description.en: Lin Keqing succeeded Zhang Gong (born 1961) as Executive Vice Mayor of Beijing Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 崔述强接替林克庆担任北京市人民政府常务副市长。
description.en: Cui Shuqiang succeeded Lin Keqing as Executive Vice Mayor of Beijing Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会教育工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 林克庆担任北京市委教育工委书记期间，时任北京市委书记为郭金龙。
description.en: While Lin Keqing served as Secretary of the Education Work Committee, the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee was Guo Jinlong.

description.zh-cn: 林克庆担任北京市委教育工委书记期间，时任北京市委书记为蔡奇。
description.en: While Lin Keqing served as Secretary of the Education Work Committee, the Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee was Cai Qi.

description.zh-cn: 林克庆接替苟仲文担任中国共产党北京市委员会教育工作委员会书记。
description.en: Lin Keqing succeeded Gou Zhongwen as Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 王宁 (1960年)接替林克庆担任中国共产党北京市委员会教育工作委员会书记。
description.en: Wang Ning (born 1960) succeeded Lin Keqing as Secretary of the Education Work Committee of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

中国共产党北京市大兴区委员会

description.zh-cn: 林克庆接替沈宝昌 (1952年)担任中国共产党北京市大兴区委员会书记。
description.en: Lin Keqing succeeded Shen Baochang (born 1952) as Secretary of the CPC Beijing Daxing District Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李长友接替林克庆担任中国共产党北京市大兴区委员会书记。
description.en: Li Changyou succeeded Lin Keqing as Secretary of the CPC Beijing Daxing District Committee.

relationships.target: 北京市大兴区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 林克庆接替王惠民 (1955年)担任北京市大兴区人民政府区长。
description.en: Lin Keqing succeeded Wang Huimin (born 1955) as Mayor of the Daxing District People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 李长友接替林克庆担任北京市大兴区人民政府区长。
description.en: Li Changyou succeeded Lin Keqing as Mayor of the Daxing District People's Government.
